name: mock-proxy-middleware
description: local server mock and proxy tool

scripts.build: uglifyjs src/index.js -o dist/index.js -c & (uglifyjs src/utils.js -o dist/utils.js -c) & (uglifyjs src/mock.js -o dist/mock.js -c) & (uglifyjs src/proxy.js -o dist/proxy.js -c) & (uglifyjs src/apis-doc.js -o dist/apis-doc.js -c) & (node src/manage/main.js)

author: zhangshaolong
